column4: as in "I uninstalled Donkey_killer but now Firefox doesnt work."
cli?
oh right. Still, for a noobie Synaptic is great.
its great for non noobs too :D
Anyone know if I need to restart anything to make new users useable?
I just made a user but she cant login on the network.
lol
if you're loggin in ubuntu from windows, you shouldnt need admin rights should you?
define "loggin in" ssh? http? ftp? vnc? nx?
Login thru Network Places.
in that case, it depends on the security of the files and if the user has access or not... you don't need to be admin by any menas
oh i see. Where do I check off which files can be accessed by the new user? Basically, its a whole folder (pictures).
right click, properties
so for 'Others' (under permissions) it should read 'Read and Write' ?
sure... you added that user to the samba users list via "sudo smbpasswd -a username" right?
no, i just added the user with the User Groups GUI
AHHHHH of course.....LOL thanks mate! [slaps forehead![
it's simply "sudo smbpasswd -a username" to add a new user :)
oh. . . . . right.. . . . .i knew that... :S Thanks again :)
np, have a good one
U2
Just wanted to say that Loggin In now works like a charm - thx!
